WorkItem.ClosedComment: The actual 'this' value in a => expression is going to be called '_this' in the debugger (refer to the emitted JS code). Unfortunately this is one area where debuggers like Chrome and VS can really confuse the issue, at least until ES6 is widely adopted.
WorkItem.Description:
I feel like I'm going crazy. I was looking into an issue today and I came across where this didn't equal the view model like it did in previous releases (unless I somehow went full ret...).

Take a look at the screenshot..

Full source can be found here: https://github.com/exceptionless/Exceptionless/blob/master/Source/App/Scripts/App/ViewModels/Base/ViewModelBase.ts
